Blood pints are an item obtained by pickpocketing Vyres and also can be purchased at The Crypt, Darkmeyer's pub, for two coins.

When drunk, it will raise the player's Attack and Strength levels by 2 + 4% of their base levels, rounded down, while lowering their Magic and Prayer levels by 2 + 4% of their current levels, rounded down. Upon drinking the ale, the message "You drink the Blood Pint. It tastes unsurprisingly awful and makes you feel a bit sick." will appear.

The blood pint cannot be used to create a vial of blood or unfinished cadantine blood potion: when combined with a vial, the message "You try to fill your vial with blood but it spills all over the ground." appears, leaving the player with an empty beer glass and the empty vial, and when combined with a cadantine, the message "Your standards are not low enough to try that." appears.

Blood pints, as well as raw and cooked versions of mystery meat, can be given to Frank.

[[File:Blood pint detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Blood pints''' are an item obtained by pickpocketing [[Vyre (Thieving)|Vyres]] and also can be purchased at [[The Crypt]], [[Darkmeyer]]'s pub, for two coins.

When drunk, it will raise the player's [[Attack]] and [[Strength]] levels by 2 + 4% of their base levels, rounded down, while lowering their [[Magic]] and [[Prayer]] levels by 2 + 4% of their current levels, rounded down. Upon drinking the ale, the message "''You drink the Blood Pint. It tastes unsurprisingly awful and makes you feel a bit sick.''" will appear.

The blood pint cannot be used to create a [[vial of blood]] or [[Cadantine blood potion (unf)|unfinished cadantine blood potion]]: when combined with a [[vial]], the message "''You try to fill your vial with blood but it spills all over the ground.''" appears, leaving the player with an empty [[beer glass]] and the empty vial, and when combined with a [[cadantine]], the message "''Your standards are not low enough to try that.''" appears.

Blood pints, as well as [[Raw mystery meat|raw]] and [[Cooked mystery meat|cooked]] versions of mystery meat, can be given to [[Frank (Bloodveld)|Frank]].
